title: BimlFlex App Definition for DataTypeMappings
description: The Data Type Mapping concept provide the ability to automatically map Data Types from a source system to a more standardized data type. This can be either a conversion of the Data Type entirely, such as a int to a bigint, the expansion of an existing Data Type, such as nvarchar(13) to nvarchar(20), or the combination of both, such as char(1) to `nvarchar(10).

frontMatter.title: BimlFlex App Definition for DataTypeMappings
frontMatter.summary: Documentation of functionality within BimlFlex for DataTypeMappings
